Mickaël CANOUIL

Biostatistician, cinephile and @RLille_RUG organiser.

I am currently working as a consultant in Biostatistics in the field of genetics, i.e., proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, etc. in Lille & Paris, France.
Additionally, I am also a freelance, available for hire to work on R and Quarto related projects.
I have developed a few  packages (e.g., insane, NACHO), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (i.e., ggpacman).
I also enjoy watching movies and playing with (github.com/mcanouil/imdb-ratings).
Finally, as the main organiser of the R Lille (@RLille_RUG) User Group, I organised Meetups  on pretty much anything related to .

Have a look at my complete curriculum vitae.

Education

  • Ph.D. in Biostatistics, 2017
    University of Lille, France

  • M.Sc. in Biostatistics, Bioinformatics and Genomics (Specialised in Biostatistics), 2011
    University Claude Bernard Lyon 1, France

  • B.Sc. in Biology (Specialised in Biostatistics), 2009
    University Claude Bernard Lyon 1, France

Interests

  • Multi-omics
  • Longitudinal Data
  • Data Analysis
  • Data Visualisation
  • Knowledge Sharing
  • Learning New Skills
  • Watching Movies
